data.text: “Di langi i nua mo henuailala,
Agu agoago ga monnono be nia madaua o di uwa,
Gei au ga hagadele ga hagaamu
“Dimaadua la go di godou Dangada Abaaba Aamua,
Malaa, goodou hagalee manawa dahi
Goodou tenua dadaulia, e hai behee:
“Goodou gi maanadu ina di madagoaa
God Aamua Muginua ne wanga nia gowaa
Gei ogo tuhongo dela ne hilihili
“Mee ne gidee digaula e heehee hua
Dimaadua gu benebene a Israel gi dee doo,
Dimaadua hua modogoia ne dagi ana daangada.
“Mee guu wanga gi digaula
Nadau kau mo nadau kuudi
“Nia daangada a God gu maluagina,
Nadau daumaha ang gi nia balu god
Digaula gu tigidaumaha gi nia balu god,32.17 1 Corinthians 10.20
Digaula gu haga de langahia di nadau God,
“Di madagoaa Dimaadua ne gidee Ia
Mee ga helekai,
Digaula guu hai Au gi dubua
Dogu hagawelewele ga ulaula gadoo be di ahi,
“‘Au ga haga uda ang gi digaula
Digaula ga mmademmade i tau magamaga
Tauwa ga haga mmade nia daangada
Au bolo Au ga hunahuna digaula hagatau
Maa nei bolo Au gaa hai beelaa,
“Israel la digau nadau hagabaubau ai,
Digaula e de iloo loo be ginaadou ne aha
Ma ne aha tangada e dahi i nadau hagadaumee
Nadau hagadaumee e iloo ginaadou
Nadau hagadaumee e huaidu
e huaidu gadoo be nia waini ala ne hai
“Dimaadua e langahia e Ia nia mee
Dimaadua gaa tala di hui,
Di madagoaa Dimaadua ma ga gidee Ia
Gei Dimaadua ga heeu gi ana daangada boloo,
Goodou gu haangai digaula
“‘Ko Au hua modogoau dela go God.
Go di maa Au dela go di God Mouli,
bolo Au ga akaa dagu hulumanu dauwa
Agu amu maalei la ga haga hali nadau dodo,
“Nia henua ala i golo,
Moses mo Joshua dela go tama a Nun, meemaa e huwahuwa taahili deenei, bolo gii mee ai nia daangada Israel gi longono ginaadou.
Di madagoaa a Moses guu lawa dana agoago gi nia daangada nia helekai a God,

gei mee ga helekai, “Goodou e hai loo gi daudali agu helekai ala ne gowadu gi goodou dangi nei. Tataanga ina nia maa gi godou dama, gii mee ai digaula di daudali nia agoago huogodoo a God mo di manawa dahi.

Nia agoago aanei la hagalee nia balu helekai hua. Nia agoago aanei la go di godou mouli donu. Hagalongo gi nia maa, gei goodou ga mouli waalooloo i lodo tenua dela i baahi i golo o Jordan dela bolo ga hai henua ginai goodou.”
Go di laangi la hua, Dimaadua ga helekai gi Moses,32.48 Numbers 27.12-14; Deuteronomy 3.23-27

“Hana gi nia Gonduu Abarim ala i lodo tenua go Moab dela i di baahi gi golo o di waahale go Jericho, gaga gi tomo di Gonduu Nebo, gei goe ga gidee tenua go Canaan, deelaa tenua gaa wanga ko Au gi nia daangada Israel.
Gei goe gaa made i hongo di gonduu deelaa, gadoo be do duaahina go Aaron dela ne made i hongo di Gonduu Hor,

idimaa, goolua gu hagalee manawa dahi mai gi di Au i mua nia daangada Israel. Di madagoaa goolua nogo i baahi nia wai o Meribah, e hoohoo gi di waahale go Kadesh i lodo di Anggowaa o Zin, goolua gu haga balumee Au i mua nia daangada.
Goe ga gidee haga mogowaa tenua deelaa, gei goe hagalee e ulu gi lodo tenua dela e wanga ko Au gi nia daangada Israel.”
